name: Ricky TEJADA, Petitioner, v. William E. FORD, Steve Luska, Kenneth C. Hilbert, Respondent

parties: Ricky TEJADA, Petitioner, v. William E. FORD, Steve Luska, Kenneth C. Hilbert, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of July, 2007, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is granted. The Petition for Writ of Mandamus is denied and the judge’s name is to be stricken from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
929 A.2d 638
Ricky TEJADA, Petitioner, v. William E. FORD, Steve Luska, Kenneth C. Hilbert, Respondent.
No. 74 MM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 25, 2007.
